name: Chill Vibes Only
description:
Objective

Your customers want nothing more than to find a cozy place to chill with something nice to do! Set up the environment for maximum chill and keep things chill for as long as possible. Plants and lights give chill bonuses. Don't let the vibe get too un-chill!

Made for a private Game Jam.

Controls Keyboard/MouseGamepad (Xbox controls)ControlWASDLeft Stick Move AroundMouse AimA ButtonChange FacingLeft Mouse ButtonRight TriggerGrab Item (Hold to keep grabbing)Right Mouse ButtonLeft TriggerLift Item (Hold to keep lifting)EscapeQuit Credits

Art: Dan Cox
Programming/Audio/Music: Jared Coliadis
